name: distance-matrix
description:
The distance-matrix command calculates distances between multiple origin and destination points. Results can be output as a matrix table or detailed routes.

Useful for logistics planning, accessibility analysis, and location optimization.

options.-p, --points: Points as 'lat1,lon1;lat2,lon2;...' or path to CSV file (required)
options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: drive, walk, bike (default: drive)
options.--metric: What to calculate: time, distance, both (default: both)

output:
Distance matrix showing:
- Distances between all point pairs (meters)
- Travel times (minutes)
- Symmetric or asymmetric matrix

CSV format suitable for spreadsheets and further analysis.
